00036 #include "ChastePoint.hpp"
00037 #include "Exception.hpp"
00038 
00040 // Implementation
00042 
00043 template<unsigned DIM>
00044 ChastePoint<DIM>::ChastePoint(double v1, double v2, double v3)
00045 {
00046     if (DIM > 0)
00047     {
00048         mLocation[0] = v1;
00049     }
00050     if (DIM > 1)
00051     {
00052         mLocation[1] = v2;
00053     }
00054     if (DIM > 2)
00055     {
00056         mLocation[2] = v3;
00057     }
00058 }
00059 
00060 template<unsigned DIM>
00061 ChastePoint<DIM>::ChastePoint(std::vector<double> coords)
00062 {
00063     for (unsigned i=0; i<DIM; i++)
00064     {
00065         mLocation(i) = coords.at(i);
00066     }
00067 }
00068 
00069 template<unsigned DIM>
00070 ChastePoint<DIM>::ChastePoint(c_vector<double, DIM> location)
00071     : mLocation(location)
00072 {
00073 }
00074 
00075 template<unsigned DIM>
00076 c_vector<double, DIM>& ChastePoint<DIM>::rGetLocation()
00077 {
00078     return mLocation;
00079 }
00080 
00081 template<unsigned DIM>
00082 const c_vector<double, DIM>& ChastePoint<DIM>::rGetLocation() const
00083 {
00084     return mLocation;
00085 }
00086 
00087 template<unsigned DIM>
00088 double ChastePoint<DIM>::operator[] (unsigned i) const
00089 {
00090     assert(i<DIM);
00091     return mLocation(i);
00092 }
00093 
00094 template<unsigned DIM>
00095 double ChastePoint<DIM>::GetWithDefault(unsigned i, double def) const
00096 {
00097     if (i<DIM)
00098     {
00099         return mLocation(i);
00100     }
00101     else
00102     {
00103         return def;
00104     }
00105 }
00106 
00107 template<unsigned DIM>
00108 void ChastePoint<DIM>::SetCoordinate(unsigned i, double value)
00109 {
00110     assert(i < DIM);
00111     mLocation(i) = value;
00112 }
00113 
00114 template<unsigned DIM>
00115 bool ChastePoint<DIM>::IsSamePoint(const ChastePoint<DIM>& rPoint) const
00116 {
00117     bool returned_value = true;
00118     for (unsigned dim=0; dim<DIM; dim++)
00119     {
00120         if (rPoint[dim] != mLocation[dim])
00121         {
00122             returned_value = false;
00123             break;
00124         }
00125     }
00126     return returned_value;
00127 }

00129 // Methods of the 0d version
00130 
00131 ChastePoint<0>::ChastePoint(double v1, double v2, double v3)
00132 {
00133 }
00134 
00135 double ChastePoint<0>::operator[] (unsigned i) const
00136 {
00137     EXCEPTION("Zero-dimensional point has no data");
00138 }

00146 template class ChastePoint<3>;
